WitchMod:Athame.NAME: Athame
WitchMod:Athame.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, increase the chance of receiving rare cards by !M!% and Exhaust this card.

WitchMod:Atonement.NAME: Atonement
WitchMod:Atonement.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random Status or Curse card in your draw pile. NL Gain !B! Block.

WitchMod:BalefulWard.NAME: Baleful Ward
WitchMod:BalefulWard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If your Block is broken this turn, add a copy of this card to your hand.

WitchMod:BatFamiliar.NAME: Bat
WitchMod:BatFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply 1 Weak. Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:Bewitch.NAME: Bewitch
WitchMod:Bewitch.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Draw a card.

WitchMod:BlackBolt.NAME: Black Bolt
WitchMod:BlackBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak if you have a Curse in hand.

WitchMod:BlackShield.NAME: Black Shield
WitchMod:BlackShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block, doubled if you have a Curse in hand.

WitchMod:BloodSabbath.NAME: Blood Sabbath
WitchMod:BloodSabbath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! witchmod:decrepit to ALL enemies.

WitchMod:Boline.NAME: Boline
WitchMod:Boline.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, obtain a random potion and Exhaust this card.
WitchMod:Boline.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, obtain a random potion and Exhaust this card.

WitchMod:BoneCarving.NAME: Bone Carving
WitchMod:BoneCarving.DESCRIPTION: witchmod:Unveil: apply 1 Vulnerable to a random enemy !M! times. NL Deal !D! damage.

WitchMod:Broomstick.NAME: Broomstick
WitchMod:Broomstick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the target is Weak: damage is increased by 50% and apply 1 Weak.

WitchMod:CatFamiliar.NAME: Cat
WitchMod:CatFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:ChosenOfTheMoon.NAME: Moon Chosen
WitchMod:ChosenOfTheMoon.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Artifact when your turn begins if you have none.

WitchMod:CorruptBlood.NAME: Corrupt Blood
WitchMod:CorruptBlood.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy is Poisoned, turn all Poison into witchmod:rot, otherwise apply !M! Poison. witchmod:Recurrent.

WitchMod:CrystalResonance.NAME: Crystal Resonance
WitchMod:CrystalResonance.DESCRIPTION: witchmod:Unveil: reduce by !M! the cost of all Skills in hand for this turn. NL Gain !B! Block.

WitchMod:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
WitchMod:CursedBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a random Curse to your discard pile.

WitchMod:DarkProcession.NAME: Dark Procession
WitchMod:DarkProcession.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a copy of the last played card to your hand.

WitchMod:Decrepify.NAME: Decrepify
WitchMod:Decrepify.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! witchmod:decrepit to a random enemy X times.
WitchMod:Decrepify.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! witchmod:decrepit to a random enemy X+1 times.

WitchMod:DeliriumForm.NAME: Delirium Form
WitchMod:DeliriumForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a non-zero Cost card, draw 1 card.

WitchMod:Demonfyre.NAME: Demonfyre
WitchMod:Demonfyre.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. All Demonfyre cards deal !M! additional damage this combat. NL witchmod:Recurrent.

WitchMod:DireShriek.NAME: Dire Shriek
WitchMod:DireShriek.DESCRIPTION: witchmod:Unveil: deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

WitchMod:DoomBlade.NAME: Impending Doom
WitchMod:DoomBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Next turn the enemy loses !D! life.

WitchMod:EternalThirst.NAME: Eternal Thirst
WitchMod:EternalThirst.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL witchmod:Cleanse: Suffer at least 20 damage in this fight.
WitchMod:EternalThirst.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then heal for the unblocked damage dealt.

WitchMod:EvilEye.NAME: Evil Eye
WitchMod:EvilEye.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals an additional !M! damage for each Curse drawn this combat.

WitchMod:FatalRay.NAME: Fatal Ray
WitchMod:FatalRay.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least 7 cards in hand. Deal !D! damage.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I need 7 or more cards in hand.

WitchMod:Foresight.NAME: Foresight
WitchMod:Foresight.DESCRIPTION: Scry 2, then draw a card. If it's a Curse or a Status, exhaust it. Otherwise create a copy of it. Exhaust.

WitchMod:GhoulTouch.NAME: Ghoul Touch
WitchMod:GhoulTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then enemy loses Strength this turn equal to unblocked damage dealt.

WitchMod:GnarledBody.NAME: Gnarled Body
WitchMod:GnarledBody.DESCRIPTION: Costs 1 less for each card in hand. NL Gain !B! Block.

WitchMod:Graveburst.NAME: Graveburst
WitchMod:Graveburst.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Deal damage to all enemies equal to twice the number of Attacks in your discard pile.

WitchMod:GrimVengeance.NAME: Grim Vengeance
WitchMod:GrimVengeance.DESCRIPTION: When you are attacked apply !M! witchmod:decrepit to the attacker.

WitchMod:Harmlessness.NAME: Harmlessness
WitchMod:Harmlessness.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL witchmod:Cleanse: Play 3 skills this turn.
WitchMod:Harmlessness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times.

WitchMod:IllOmen.NAME: Ill Omen
WitchMod:IllOmen.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle a random Curse in your draw pile. The next time you draw a Curse, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. Exhaust.

WitchMod:IllusionOfStrength.NAME: Illusory Strength
WitchMod:IllusionOfStrength.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Shuffle a Delusion of Strength in your draw pile.

WitchMod:IllusionOfStrengthCurse.NAME: Delusion of Strength
WitchMod:IllusionOfStrengthCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, lose !M! Strength or exhaust this if you have Strength !M! or less.

WitchMod:Intelligence.NAME: Intelligence
WitchMod:Intelligence.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! random card from your discard pile.
WitchMod:Intelligence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! random cards from your discard pile.

WitchMod:KarmaDrain.NAME: Karma Drain
WitchMod:KarmaDrain.DESCRIPTION: Apply X Weak. Gain !B! X block.

WitchMod:LivingBomb.NAME: Living Bomb
WitchMod:LivingBomb.DESCRIPTION: If the enemy has less than !M! HP, set their HP to 0, then deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

WitchMod:MagicFang.NAME: Runic Fang
WitchMod:MagicFang.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage two times. Gain !B! Block.

WitchMod:Malady.NAME: Malady
WitchMod:Malady.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! witchmod:rot. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:MementoMori.NAME: Memento Mori
WitchMod:MementoMori.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, increased by the percentage of target's missing HP. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:MercuryWand.NAME: Mercury Wand
WitchMod:MercuryWand.DESCRIPTION: If you have 0 block: gain !B! Block, otherwise deal !D! damage.

WitchMod:MortusClaw.NAME: Mortus Claw
WitchMod:MortusClaw.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage, then the enemy loses !D! HP.

WitchMod:MysticUnburial.NAME: Mystic Unburial
WitchMod:MysticUnburial.DESCRIPTION: Choose and draw a card from your discard pile. NL Exhaust.
WitchMod:MysticUnburial.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose and draw a card from you discard pile. That card costs 0 for this turn. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:NighInvulnerability.NAME: Nigh Invulnerability
WitchMod:NighInvulnerability.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL witchmod:Cleanse: Play 3 attacks this turn.

WitchMod:OwlFamiliar.NAME: Owl
WitchMod:OwlFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:PainBolt.NAME: Pain Bolt
WitchMod:PainBolt.DESCRIPTION: Applies X Vulnerable, then deal !D! X damage.

WitchMod:Pillage.NAME: Pillage
WitchMod:Pillage.DESCRIPTION: Remove up to !M! Block from an enemy. Gain Block equal to the amount removed plus !B!.

WitchMod:PlagueSpreader.NAME: Plague Spreader
WitchMod:PlagueSpreader.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! witchmod:rot to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.
WitchMod:PlagueSpreader.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Apply !M! witchmod:rot to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:RatFamiliar.NAME: Rat
WitchMod:RatFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Apply !M! Poison and !M! witchmod:decrepit. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:RavenFamiliar.NAME: Raven
WitchMod:RavenFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Upgrade a card in your hand and reduce its cost by 1 for the rest of the combat. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:RiteOfAutumn.NAME: Rite of Autumn
WitchMod:RiteOfAutumn.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand and draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:RiteOfSpring.NAME: Rite of Spring
WitchMod:RiteOfSpring.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle in your draw pile any number of cards in your hand and gain twice that much HP. Exhaust

WitchMod:RiteOfSummer.NAME: Rite of Summer
WitchMod:RiteOfSummer.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards and deal !D! damage to a random enemy for each card discarded.

WitchMod:RiteOfWinter.NAME: Rite Of Winter
WitchMod:RiteOfWinter.DESCRIPTION: Place any number of cards in your hand on top of your draw pile and gain !B! Block for each of them.

WitchMod:RoilingBarrier.NAME: Roiling Barrier
WitchMod:RoilingBarrier.DESCRIPTION: witchmod:Unveil: increase this card's Block by !M!. Gain !B! Block. NL witchmod:Recurrent.

WitchMod:RustWall.NAME: Wall of Rust
WitchMod:RustWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. Shuffle a Curse of Rust in your draw pile.

WitchMod:RustWallCurse.NAME: Curse of Rust
WitchMod:RustWallCurse.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. At the end of your turn lose half of your block. NL Ethereal.

WitchMod:Schadenfreude.NAME: Schadenfreude
WitchMod:Schadenfreude.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a Debuff to an enemy gain !M! block.

WitchMod:Shrooms.NAME: 'Shrooms
WitchMod:Shrooms.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. They have random costs for this turn.

WitchMod:SkullFlask.NAME: Skull Flask
WitchMod:SkullFlask.DESCRIPTION: witchmod:Unveil: gain !M! Strength for this turn. NL Deal !D! damage.

WitchMod:SoulBarrier.NAME: Soul Barrier
WitchMod:SoulBarrier.DESCRIPTION: witchmod:Unveil: gain !M! block. NL Gain !B! block. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:StrangeBrew.NAME: Strange Brew
WitchMod:StrangeBrew.DESCRIPTION: Apply on yourself the effect of all your drinkable potions, without consuming them. Exhaust
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have any drinkable potion!

WitchMod:SummonBatFamiliar.NAME: Bat Familiar
WitchMod:SummonBatFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Bat to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.
WitchMod:SummonBatFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Bat to your hand. Removes other Familiar powers.

WitchMod:SummonCatFamiliar.NAME: Cat Familiar
WitchMod:SummonCatFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Cat to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.
WitchMod:SummonCatFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Cat to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.

WitchMod:SummonOwlFamiliar.NAME: Owl Familiar
WitchMod:SummonOwlFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an Owl to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.
WitchMod:SummonOwlFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Owl to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.

WitchMod:SummonRatFamiliar.NAME: Rat Familiar
WitchMod:SummonRatFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Rat to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.
WitchMod:SummonRatFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Rat to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.

WitchMod:SummonRavenFamiliar.NAME: Raven Familiar
WitchMod:SummonRavenFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Raven to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.
WitchMod:SummonRavenFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Raven to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.

WitchMod:SummonToadFamiliar.NAME: Toad Familiar
WitchMod:SummonToadFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Toad to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.
WitchMod:SummonToadFamiliar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add an upgraded Toad to your hand. NL Removes other Familiar powers.

WitchMod:Thundercloud.NAME: Thundercloud
WitchMod:Thundercloud.DESCRIPTION: witchmod:Unveil: apply !M! Weak to a random enemy. NL Deal !D! damage to all Weak enemies.

WitchMod:ToadFamiliar.NAME: Toad
WitchMod:ToadFamiliar.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Gain !B! Block. Reduce your Vulnerable, Weak and Frail by !M!. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:TrollsBlood.NAME: Troll's Blood
WitchMod:TrollsBlood.DESCRIPTION: Recover !M! HP at the end of each turn in which you played at least an attack.

WitchMod:TwistedMind.NAME: Twisted Mind
WitchMod:TwistedMind.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card that costs 2 or more, ALL enemies lose !M! HP.

WitchMod:Twitch.NAME: Twitch
WitchMod:Twitch.DESCRIPTION: witchmod:Unveil: gain !M! Dexterity this turn. NL Gain !B! block.

WitchMod:UnluckySeven.NAME: Unlucky Seven
WitchMod:UnluckySeven.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL witchmod:Cleanse: Have your current HP ending with 7.
WitchMod:UnluckySeven.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! [B]. NL Draw !M! cards. NL Lose !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

WitchMod:VileEgg.NAME: Vile Egg
WitchMod:VileEgg.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Add a random Familiar to your hand. It costs 0 this turn. NL Exhaust

WitchMod:WalpurgisNight.NAME: Walpurgis Night
WitchMod:WalpurgisNight.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle ALL Exhausted non-Etheral Attacks and Skills into your draw pile, then draw !M! of those cards. Exhaust
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I don't have any valid card in my exhaust pile.

WitchMod:WickedThoughts.NAME: Wicked Thoughts
WitchMod:WickedThoughts.DESCRIPTION: Retain. Draw !M! card for each curse in your hand.
WitchMod:WickedThoughts.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Draw !M! cards for each curse in your hand.

WitchMod:WretchedNails.NAME: Wretched Nails
WitchMod:WretchedNails.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card, then deal damage equal to the number of cards you have drawn this turn.
WitchMod:WretchedNails.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards, then deal damage equal to the number of cards you have drawn this turn.
